title: Coat Worn By Melania Trump In 9/11 Tribute Photo Stirs Controversy On Social Media
text:
President Donald Trump and First Lady Melania Trump took a 9/11 photo shoot recently, with one of the images ending up on Trump's Twitter feed with the words "WE WILL NEVER FORGET" overlaid on it.

It seemed like a very standard September 11th tribute, but people on social media noticed something peculiar about the First Lady's coat.

On the back of her coat, there is some white stitching. People enhanced the image for a closer look at it and started claiming it looked like a plane flying into a tower.

"Did they fire all the stylists too or is Melania just the biggest troll ever??," one person commented.

This is clearly accidental, but that didn't stop people from commenting on it. Perhaps someone on the First Lady's staff should've noticed the stitching, but it seems a bit absurd to get worked up over it.

When asked about it, White House spokeswoman Stephanie Grisham called the whole thing "ridiculous."

One Twitter user pointed out that our brains allow us to see what we want to see. This was nothing more than an optical illusion that people are probably looking to much into.
